casebody.data:
JOHNSON
v.
SUPERIOR COURT JUDGE. No. 119P00-22. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2008. Daniel P. O'Brien, Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney Generals, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of June 2008 by for Petition for Preliminary Injunction: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2008." TIMMONS-GOODSON, J., recused.
